Confirmation.title: Thank you for submitting!
Confirmation.text: Thank you for completing the form ! I'll be in touch with you shortly.
Confirmation.paragraph1: An error occurred while transmitting the request.
Confirmation.paragraph2: Please check your Internet connection and try again later.

leftSection.title: Start your project with KASKOD !
leftSection.paragraph1: Tell me more about your business goals. I will get back to you within 1 working day.
leftSection.paragraph2: Curious about what I can do for you ? i'm happy to tell you more!
leftSection.paragraphEnd: Have any other questions ? Write to me via email

question5.title: Do you already have an idea of the design or functionality of your app?
